article_title: Should State Medicaid Programs Pay $239,000 Per Patient Year For A Medication?

article_metadata.description: We could better manage Medicaid spending if states were given the freedom to use cost-effectiveness criteria in determining what treatments to be covered by that program.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
